name: OTA Update
description: Provides seamless over-the-air software updates to ensure the latest features and security patches.

name: App Manager
description: Manages third-party app updates and security to enhance system stability and user experience.

name: Spotify
description: Stream music and podcasts directly within the infotainment system for a superior in-car experience.

name: Video Player
description: Supports high-quality playback of videos for passenger entertainment during travel.

name: Driver Monitoring System
description: Monitors driver health and alertness using heart rate and BP sensors to ensure road safety.

name: Blind Spot Detection
description: Uses advanced sensors to detect vehicles in blind spots and provide alerts to drivers.

name: ADAS Features
description: Includes AEB (Automatic Emergency Braking), ACC (Adaptive Cruise Control), and Lane Keep Assist.

name: Automated Parking
description: Helps drivers with precise and effortless parking in tight spaces.

name: Ambient Light Services
description: Customizable ambient lighting for enhanced in-car aesthetics and mood.

name: User Preferences
description: Allows users to adjust seat height, light intensity, and other preferences for personalized comfort.

name: Sensor Health Monitor
description: Tracks the health of critical sensors and provides alerts for predictive maintenance.

name: Tyre Pressure Monitoring
description: Monitors tire pressure in real-time and alerts the driver in case of abnormalities.

name: Security Patch Manager
description: Delivers regular security updates to protect against vulnerabilities and ensure data safety.

name: Crash Recovery System
description: Automatically restarts critical systems in case of unexpected crashes to ensure minimal downtime.

name: YouTube
description: Streams your favorite videos and playlists on the infotainment screen during long drives.

name: Gaming Hub
description: Offers a variety of casual games for passengers to enjoy while traveling.

name: Fatigue Alert System
description: Analyzes driver behavior and provides alerts when signs of fatigue or drowsiness are detected.

name: Collision Avoidance System
description: Warns drivers about potential collisions and assists in evasive maneuvers.

name: Personal Assistant AI
description: Voice-controlled assistant for navigation, calling, and controlling car settings.

name: Smart Navigation
description: Provides real-time traffic updates and adaptive route suggestions for stress-free travel.

name: Climate Control Personalization
description: Allows users to adjust climate settings for individual zones within the car.

name: Mood-Based Light Settings
description: Automatically adjusts ambient lighting based on detected or chosen moods.

name: Battery Health Monitor
description: Tracks battery performance and provides alerts for necessary maintenance or replacement.

name: Remote Vehicle Access
description: Allows remote access to lock, unlock, or start the vehicle using a mobile app.
